item.title: From Zero to Freelancer: A 30-Day Action Plan for Beginners in Iraq
item.description: A concrete, day-by-day 30-day plan to go from zero freelancing experience to landing your first paid client from Iraq. No vague advice â€” specific actions for each day.

item.title: How to Start Freelancing from Iraq in 2026
item.description: A step-by-step guide to launching your freelancing career from Iraq. Covers platforms, payment methods, skill positioning, and how to land your first clients from Kurdistan and beyond.

item.title: How to Get Paid Online in Iraq: Payoneer, PayPal Alternatives & Crypto
item.description: A practical guide to receiving international payments in Iraq. Covers Payoneer, Wise, crypto options, and local workarounds that actually work in Kurdistan and the rest of Iraq.
